label: tmux: Project Session
command: session=$(basename "$PWD" | tr . _); tmux new-session -A -s "$session" \; set-option status off

label: tmux: Terminal 1
command: session=$(basename "$PWD" | tr . _); tmux new-session -A -s "$session" -d \; set-option status off 2>/dev/null; tmux select-window -t "$session:1" 2>/dev/null || tmux new-window -t "$session:1"; tmux attach -t "$session:1"
